row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_WINDOWS_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Directory name" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 0 :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Directory name" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR#
:SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_TYPE@WINDOWS
:IF &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 100 __uc_return(100) :ENDIF
if ($EXIST -eq 1) { :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Directory/File with name '&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR#' already exists." :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO }else{
! Start execution :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Create directory &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
: SET &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR#,'`','``') : SET &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR#,'"','""') New-Item -ItemType directory "&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS }
